alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 1:53PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...An area of slow moving thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Nye, west central White Pine and southeastern Eureka Counties through 230 PM PDT... At 151 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles south of Pinto Summit, drifting northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Brief heavy rain could cause ponding of water on local roadways, causing slick driving conditions. Locations impacted include... Eureka, Pinto Summit, Little Antelope Summit, Newark Valley and Pancake Summit. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential but brief rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County
